body.p:
This view displays a list with all entities declared in the current document, as well as built-in ones. Double-clicking one of the entities will insert it at the current cursor position. You can also sort entities by name and value by clicking the column headers. The Entities View
The Entities View

The view features a filtering capability that allows you to search an entity by name, value, or both. Also, you can choose to display the internal or external entities.When entering filters, you can use the ? and * wildcards. Also, you can enter multiple filters by separating them with comma.
